trans-unit.source: Provides methods to manage a collection of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para gerir uma coleção de <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: ImageList is typically used by other controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: ImageList é normalmente utilizado por outros controlos, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can add bitmaps or icons to the ImageList, and the other controls are able to use the images as they require.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar os ícones ou os mapas de bits à ImageList e os outros controlos são capazes de utilizar as imagens que necessitam.

trans-unit.source: ImageList uses a handle to manage the list of images.
trans-unit.target: ImageList utiliza um identificador para gerir a lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> is not created until certain operations, such as getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> or calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Draw%2A>, are performed on the image list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>não é criada até determinadas operações, como obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>ou chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Draw%2A>, são efetuadas na lista de imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Draw%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performing other operations, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> to be recreated.
trans-unit.target: Efetuar outras operações, tais como a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>fará com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>ser recriadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should perform these operations before you add images to the ImageList.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, deverá efetuar estas operações antes de adicionar imagens à ImageList.

trans-unit.source: In addition, when you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an ImageList and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, quando trabalhar com formulários que irão ser localizados, deve sempre adicionar uma ImageList e imagens quando a propriedade de idioma de um formulário é definida como Default.

trans-unit.source: Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the application resource files.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o idioma do formulário antes de adicionar imagens danificará os ficheiros de recursos de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> class with default values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> classe com valores predefinidos para <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor*>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: |Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>|In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth>.
trans-unit.target: | Item | Descrição | |----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>| No .NET Framework versão 1.0, a predefinição é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>|The default is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with a height and width of 16 by 16.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor%2A>|The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.|
trans-unit.target: No .NET Framework versão 1.1 ou posterior, a predefinição é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>| A predefinição é um objeto de <xref:System.Drawing.Size>com uma altura e largura de 16 por 16. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor%2A>| O valor predefinido é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>. |</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.TransparentColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> class, associating it with a container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> classe, associar a um contentor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> constructor enables you to associate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> with any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>construtor permite-lhe associar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>com qualquer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: By associating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: Ao associar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>como esta, entregar através de controlo da duração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser útil se utilizar um número de componentes na sua aplicação e pretende eliminar todos eles em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you associate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>, calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> on the Container will force disposal of all of these components as well.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se associar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>com um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>, chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>no contentor irá forçar disposal de todos estes componentes, bem como.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to associate with this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> a associar a esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color depth of the image list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a profundidade de cor de lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: When you set the color depth to a new value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> for the image list is recreated.
trans-unit.target: Quando define a profundidade de cor para um novo valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>para a imagem de lista é recriada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because setting the ColorDepth property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set ColorDepth prior to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Porque a definição da propriedade ColorDepth faz com que o identificador de ser recriadas, deverá definir ColorDepth antes da definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the handle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has been created, setting the ColorDepth or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> properties in code, after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property, will cause the collection of images set for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Quando o identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tiver sido criada, definir o ColorDepth ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>Propriedades no código, após a definição a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade, fará com que a coleção de imagens definidas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade ser eliminadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The number of available colors for the image.
trans-unit.target: O número de cores disponíveis para a imagem.

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No .NET Framework versão 1.0, a predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No .NET Framework versão 1.1 ou posterior, a predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The color depth is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A profundidade de cor não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColorDepth"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Draws the image indicated by the specified index on the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the given location.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem indicada pelo índice especificado no especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The location defined by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: A localização definida por um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O índice é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than or equal to the count of images in the image list.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o índice é maior que ou igual à contagem de imagens na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Draws the image indicated by the given index on the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem indicada pelo índice fornecido no especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position at which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: A posição horizontal que desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position at which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical no qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O índice é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than or equal to the count of images in the image list.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o índice é maior que ou igual à contagem de imagens na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Draws the image indicated by the given index on the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> using the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem indicada pelo índice fornecido no especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> a localização especificada e o tamanho a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The image is stretched or compressed as necessary to fit the bounds provided.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é stretched (ampliada) ou comprimida conforme necessária satisfazer os limites fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position at which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: A posição horizontal que desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position at which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical no qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the destination image.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da imagem de destino.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the destination image.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da imagem de destino.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O índice é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than or equal to the count of images in the image list.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o índice é maior que ou igual à contagem de imagens na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle of the image list object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do objeto de lista de imagem.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to a Win32 HIMAGELIST handle.
trans-unit.target: Isto corresponde a um identificador Win32 HIMAGELIST.

trans-unit.source: The handle is not created until you need to use it.
trans-unit.target: O identificador não é criado até que terá de utilizá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Getting the handle causes it to be created.
trans-unit.target: Obter o identificador faz com que a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: The handle for the image list.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para a lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creating the handle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> failed.
trans-unit.target: Criar o identificador para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> falhou.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying Win32 handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o identificador Win32 subjacente foi criado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*> has been created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*>tiver sido criado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection> for this image list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection>para esta lista de imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the image collection has not yet been created, it is created when you retrieve this property.
trans-unit.target: Se a coleção de imagem ainda não tiver sido criada, é criado quando obter esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The collection of images.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho das imagens na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ImageSize property prior to adding images to the image collection causes the images to be resized to the image size specified.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade ImageSize antes de adicionar imagens à coleção de imagens faz com que as imagens para ser redimensionada para o tamanho de imagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: When you set the ImageSize property to a new value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> for the image list is recreated.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade ImageSize para um novo valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>para a imagem de lista é recriada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because setting the ImageSize property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set ImageSize prior to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Porque a definição da propriedade ImageSize faz com que o identificador de ser recriadas, deverá definir ImageSize antes da definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the handle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has been created, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> or ImageSize properties in code, after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property, will cause the collection of images set for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Quando o identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tiver sido criado, a definição a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>ou propriedades de ImageSize no código, após a definição a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade, fará com que a coleção de imagens definidas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade ser eliminadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that defines the height and width, in pixels, of the images in the list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que define a altura e largura, em pixels, de imagens na lista.

trans-unit.source: The default size is 16 by 16.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho predefinido é de 16 por 16.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size is 256 by 256.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo é 256 por 256.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is equal to <xref:System.Drawing.Size.IsEmpty*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é igual ao <xref:System.Drawing.Size.IsEmpty*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.IsEmpty*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the height or width is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor da largura ou altura é menor ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the height or width is greater than 256.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor da largura ou altura superior a 256.

trans-unit.source: The new size has a dimension less than 0 or greater than 256.
trans-unit.target: O novo tamanho tem uma dimensão inferior a 0 ou superior a 256.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> associated with this image list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"> </xref> associados a esta lista de imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> is the data portion of the image list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>é a parte de dados da lista de imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: When you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default.
trans-unit.target: Quando trabalha com formulários que irão ser localizados, deve adicionar sempre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>e imagens quando a propriedade de idioma de um formulário é definida como Default.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the image stream.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o idioma do formulário antes de adicionar imagens danificará o fluxo de imagens.

trans-unit.source: You can pass this handle to another instance of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Pode transmitir este identificador noutra instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the image list is empty; otherwise, a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Se a lista de imagens está vazia; caso contrário, um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*> is recreated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*>é recriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to do special processing when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A> is recreated by actions such as changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para um processamento especial quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>é recriado por ações como a alteração do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Special processing may be required because setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> property causes the handle to be recreated and the images to be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ser necessário processamento especial porque a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>propriedade após a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A>propriedade faz com que o identificador de ser recriadas e as imagens sejam eliminadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.Images%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ColorDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains additional data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados adicionais sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains additional data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados adicionais sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O método ToString devolve uma cadeia que inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor para tratar como transparente.

trans-unit.source: The transparent color is not rendered when the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A cor transparente não é composta quando a imagem é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Transparent" name="Transparent" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Transparent" name="Transparent" href=""> </xref>.
